title: When your team tells you to go afk and you do..
body: Should you be punished for being hurt, feeling useless and cooperating with your team's wishes?

replies.body: Probs u can stop feeding , play safe and commumicate effectively with your teammates. I hate those who feel useless and go splot push and do not join teamfights until they got enough gold and leveling while feeding enemies at the same time. U could stop trying to be a fuking superstar all games and learn to take a supportive  role for ur team time to time. In fact, its 5v5 game

nothing annoys me more in this game when someone continues to fight with their opposite when they are getting they're ass kicked and they just feed their ass off, they just dont stop, it mean that the enemy jungler has one less lane to worry about, he can then just power farm or camp mid/bot

I played a game recently, our first pick banned Yas, second took Zed and we asked third to ban Fizz, fair call, three good bans... so what does he do? Ban Rammus.

And it went a little something like this:

* ME: "I can't go against Fizz, if they pick Fizz and he is Mid I will play safe and still probably feed"
* *Game starts* ME: " I cannot go against a Fizz"
* ME: *Start feeding*
* Last pick: "Your terrible, blah blah blah" (He was just ranting all game from this point on wards)
* ME: "Fizz is probably the ONLY champion I cannot beat"
* Last pick: "Rant, rave, blaming me for everything"
* Fizz went AFK
* Last pick was STILL ranting and threatened to AFK, so I dared him, and he did it
* I did NOT die from when Fizz went AFK until he came back, even with our ADC going and being a little bitch
* Last pick came back, still ranting and refusing to listen that I can't go against Fizz, even when I note I have not died since he went AFK
* Fizz back, I start feeding again
* Last pick continuing to rant

SOMETIMES it is better if your player fucks off and makes your game a better place. Other times, it depends on what they want you to AFK for. At the end of the day, if you are being asked to leave, it is either because you are a fuckwit and cannot play, or make a shit fuck of a decisions and either leave an OP champ in the game who I specifically told them I will end up feeding, or just make generally bad decisions that make a winnable game, a loss. I just know it, Fizz is a fuck of a champ who is just one of those that do my head in, but no, alas he was left in the game and in the end, carried the enemy team.
